displaymaker: attributed to Hendrick Goltzius, 1558–1617; born Mülbracht, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands | Engraver Willem Janszoon Blaeu, Dutch, 1571–1638
caption: Attributed to Hendrick Goltzius (1558–1617; born Mülbracht, Netherlands; died Haarlem, Netherlands), Engraver Willem Janszoon Blaeu (Dutch, 1571–1638), The Young St. John the Baptist, ca. 1595. Chiaroscuro woodcut; line block and two tone blocks in light green/green; 24.3 x 14.1 cm, 23.7 x 14.1 cm (block), 24.4 x 14.1 cm (sheet). Bequest of Junius S. Morgan, Class of 1888 (x1934-690)
